summary: Completed comprehensive testing of TripStars Phase 6 features: Team member task assignment, Admin self-deactivation prevention, Chat (DM + Group), WebSocket, Read receipts, Typing indicators, and Attachments. All 27 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend UI verified working for all features.
passed_tests: Backend: All 27 Phase 6 API tests passed (100%)
Backend: Team member can access /api/tasks endpoint
Backend: Team member can get assignable users (managers + members, no admins)
Backend: Team member can create task assigned to manager
Backend: Team member can create task assigned to other member
Backend: Team member cannot assign task to admin (403)
Backend: Admin cannot deactivate self (400)
Backend: Chat - Get available users for chat
Backend: Chat - Create direct message conversation
Backend: Chat - Create group chat with 2+ members
Backend: Chat - List conversations
Backend: Chat - Group requires name validation
Backend: Chat - Group requires minimum participants validation
Backend: Chat - Send text message
Backend: Chat - Get messages from conversation
Backend: Chat - Mark messages as read (read receipts)
Backend: Chat - Typing indicator API
Backend: Chat - Upload attachment
Backend: Chat - Send message with attachment
Backend: WebSocket endpoint exists
Backend: Notifications endpoint works
Backend: Notification created on task assignment
Backend: Mark notification as read
Backend: Mark all notifications as read
Frontend: Team member can access All Tasks page
Frontend: Team member can see Create Task button
Frontend: Create Task modal shows user dropdown for assignment
Frontend: Chat page loads with conversations list
Frontend: New Chat modal shows available users
Frontend: New Group modal with name input and member selection
Frontend: Chat messages display with timestamps
Frontend: Read receipts (checkmarks) visible on messages
Frontend: Message sending works
Frontend: Conversation list updates with last message preview
seed_data_creation: Test tasks and conversations created during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 6 testing complete. All new features verified: Team member task assignment with role restrictions, Admin self-deactivation prevention, Chat with DM and Group support, WebSocket for real-time updates, Read receipts, Typing indicators, and Attachments. Test file at /app/tests/test_phase6_backend.py covers all Phase 6 features.
